subject: Shifter
description_text:
Is this ever going to ship? 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi David Green, We’re very sorry for the delay with your order. There was an angle deviation on a mid sheet-metal part for the HS Pro, so we asked the supplier to remake the parts, which caused the delay and a backlog of orders. We have now received the updated parts, production has resumed, and shipments are now going out in sequence. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Also, could you please share your order number ? We’ll check it right away and update you with the latest shipping status.

Thank you, Order #SSN5611 
Sent from my iPhone
Hi David Green, Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive around the 22nd. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224439434
